channel.title: Clan chat
channel.description: hey, i am trying to add a clan chat and the guide i found told me to add this code "public String clan = null; // Clan Chat" under public String specbar;. problem is i dont have public string specbar, anybody know where to add it?

item.title: Clan chat
item.dc:creator: @AbuseYourUsername AbuseYourUsername
item.description:
@AbuseYourUsername wrote:

Just search for ‘public String’ and add it there.

Read full topic
